name: The Inn Crowd
description:
You're Mai, an orc tavenier with moxy. Do you have what it takes to turn your tavern into the best inn in town? 

Features multiple creative skills and roles. Use your skills as a chef to prep meals for your hungry patrons; while still using your talent of brewing and preserving to plan ahead for the future. Grow, cook, greet, serve do it all in this turn-based time management  and JRPG game. Can you befriend the regular patrons? How many of the secret endings can you unlock?

Rating: 18+ for use of Alcohol; Some Adult Language.

Credits: Main developer: Dave Seidman-Joria; additional content by Monica Marier, Rachael Hixon, Steve Moyer, and Indy Adenan. A Tangent Artists project.

Art Credits: additional Assets and Plugins used; will be credited in the full version.

Made with RPG Maker MV

Update 12/1 - New version that fixes the prologue bug and the missing files.

Update - 11/30 - A friend found 2 BIG bugs already; this patches version 2-1
1.   3 image files missing from the SV_actors folder - included in the patch below.

2. key assets don't appear if you watch the prologue. (I'm working on fixing that, but in the meantime): after you've the prologue, start again, SKIPPING prologue - this bypasses the problem).
